items.sentence: How old were you when you got your first bike?
I think buying a new one would be a good idea.
Did Tom say when he was going to go to Boston?
Buy two bottles of olive oil and get one free.
Did Tom say when he was going to visit Boston?
I wonder why Tom refused to help Mary do that?
Nothing special is going to happen here today.
What did Tom do with everything that was here?
Tom couldn't figure out why Mary was so upset.
I don't think that we'll do that anytime soon.
